sentence: The challenge was filed by the same coalition of constitutional scholars and liberal activists who unsuccessfully tried to block Rep. Madison Cawthorn from the GOP primary ballot in North Carolina.
author: Marshall Cohen
title: Groups try to disqualify Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene's candidacy over January 6

sentence: Also says Cawthorn admitted his orgy & cocaine allegations were exaggerated/untrue.? Madison Cawthorn has been a big headache for his party: [Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.),] the 26-year-old first-term lawmaker has been a minor irritation to some Republicans since he joined the House in 2021, but the most recent remarks have put tempers at the boiling point for House Republicans.? Oh and: Cawthorn is also facing an eight-way Republican primary for his seat.
title: The Hill's 12:30 Report  Cawthorn creates headaches for Republicans

sentence: The Tar Heel State is, however, proving troublesome in other ways after a former district staff member for Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) accused the 26-year-old lawmaker of improperly firing her after denying family and medical leave.
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hill's Morning Report  Biden administration makes huge election year decision

sentence: The Hill, The Daily Beast and The Washington Post: Questions about professional standards for House members are back in the headlines because of freshman Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) and his pileup of eyebrow-raising controversies.
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hill's Morning Report  Lacking votes, Dems plot message on abortion
